string.value: Tell Chief Stan what #p1012108# told you.

Chief Stan says the culprit the Golems change may be inside the door with the puppet. He askes you to #benter that door, defeat the Enraged Golems, and bring back the culprit#k. He seems to think it might be a #bdoll or puppet#k...\r\n\r\n#i4032466# #t4032466# #b#c4032466# / 1#k

You eliminated the Golems and brought the #t4032466# to Chief Stan. Chief Stan says if the puppet had been left alone, the Golems would certainly have attacked #m100000000#. He thanks you for saving #m100000000#.

What did #p1012108# say? Hm, so that #rsuspicious door with the strange puppet sitting on top#k has something to do with this. I have a feeling there is an object of some sort that changes the Golems behind that door. It could very well be a puppet.
There have been many incidents involving puppets near #m100000000# lately. But it was mostly the Mushrooms causing a ruckus.
Golems are much scarier. But the cause of their change appears to be linked to the other incidents that have happened in #m100000000# and other towns.
But we can't assume anything until we see what's behind that door with the puppet ourselves. Could you look into this?
Go to #m106010102# and enter through the #bdoor with strange puppet sitting on top#k. When you see #rEnranged Golems#k, defeat them and bring me a #bPuppet#k if you happen to find one. Good luck.
I never thought I'd depend on #p1013103#'s second child like this. Ha, life really is full of surprises.
You don't think you can do it? I thought you'd be confident in yourself. Must I find a stronger adventurer?
So? What did you find behind that door? Isn't this a #t4032466#? Who could be behind all of this?
If we had left the doll, more Golems would have turned violent and attacked #m100000000#. You have saved us, Evan. Thank you. You are a hero that has saved #m100000000#.
Haven't you gone over to #b#m910600000##k yet? The main instigator in all of this must be behind #bthat door with the strange puppet sitting on top#k! Rush over there!
